roleset.name: play again
roleset.note: REPLAY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'replay' based on sentences in ebc. Comparison with play (from replay.01-v predicate notes)
REPLAY-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to replay.01-v. No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from replay.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: We see news services replaying footage by al-Jazeera TV station.

example.name: both args
example.text: The BBC's constant replays of the incident is getting tiresome.
